title: Plastc card
content:
Hi !

Can you ID the font use in this logo?

Thanks! Charlie

comments.content:
Customized (top, crossbar, and tail of the |t|, especially) Myriad Pro Bold:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/myriad/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415025704/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/myriad/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/myriad/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415025704im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Myriad_4666.png)
